summary: This is a very simple and quick mod to change the Dawnguard Heavy to light armor and the Light Armor to Heavy so when you get you first Dawnguard armor set given to you by gunmar you get all heavy armor than heavy Cuirass and normal and Boots
descriptionHtml:
----------REQUIRES DAWNGUARD TO BE INSTALLED FIRST ----------

Don't forget to endorse it keeps me motivated to continue working on this mod.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

A little fix i made this week i thought is was stupid to get given by Gunmar Heavy Cuirass and just boots and Gauntlets, it should be Heavy Cuirass,Heavy Boots and Heavy Gauntlets you see And the Cuirass should not be called Dawnguard Heavy Armor it should be called Dawnguard Heavy Cuirass same with the light just with Light not Heavy, Replace the Light Helmet with a Hood But i will add the Light Helmet back in to the game, Changes the Dawnguard Heavy Armor name to light armor and the Light Armor name to Heavy so when you get you first Dawnguard armor set given to you.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

----------UPDATE 1.1A WORK IN PROGRESS----------

One of the Light Armor is very back Texture misplaced (Fix)
May have Perraine mod "Dawnguard Heavy Boots and Gauntlets" Textures (Waiting to here Back)
Make One of the Heavy Armor Red ( One Red One Brown)

----------UPDATE 1.1 OUT NOW----------

Changed the Red Armor to Brown Armor
Changed the light helmet to a hood Like rcavanah mod called "Light Dawnguard Helmet Replace - Dawnguard Hood" Mod at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22214
Maybe using Perraine mod "Dawnguard Heavy Boots and Gauntlets" Textures his mod is at
at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23935
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

----------KNOWN ERRORS/BUGS----------

One of the Light Armor is very back Texture misplaced
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

----------OTHER MOD----------

Winterhold Decay at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30630/
author: Mad Mat 88
